name: Nodes Pos
title: Regional Nodes Positive
notes:
**Note 1**:  Record this field even if there has been preoperative treatment.

**Note 2**:  Lymph nodes with isolated tumor cells (ITCs) are counted as positive lymph nodes.  ITCs are defined as any tumor deposits in lymph nodes less than or equal to 0.2 mm.

**Note 3**:  Although satellite nodules and in-transit metastasis are coded under CS Lymph Nodes, DO NOT count as Regional Nodes Positive in this field.
rows: 1 - 89 nodes positive (code exact number of nodes positive)
Positive aspiration or core biopsy of lymph node(s)

Unknown if nodes are positive; not applicable
Not documented in patient record
